content: META: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Phase 0.1: Find all occurrences of eprintln! in the codebase
Phase 0.2: Remove or replace eprintln! with debug_info collection
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing eprintln!
Phase 1.1: Remove DiscoverableItem trait definition from cargo_detector.rs
Phase 1.2: Remove DiscoverableItem implementations for BinaryInfo and ExampleInfo
Phase 1.3: Remove unused scanning import from cargo_detector.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing unused trait
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Phase 4.2.1: Update safe_canonicalize to accept debug_info parameter
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating safe_canonicalize
Phase 4.2.2: Thread debug_info through iter_cargo_project_paths function
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating iter_cargo_project_paths
Phase 4.2.3: Update recursive_scan and helper functions to accept debug_info
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating recursive_scan
Phase 4.2.4: Update find_required_app_with_path to collect and return debug info
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating find_required_app_with_path
Phase 4.2.5: Update find_required_example_with_path to collect and return debug info
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating find_required_example_with_path
Phase 4.2.6: Update launch functions to use auto_inject_debug_info
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating launch functions
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Phase 4.3.1: Add validation in discover_workspace_members to check if directories exist
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding validation
Phase 5.2.1: Add unit tests for path matching logic
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding path matching tests
Phase 5.2.2: Add unit tests for recursive scanning
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding recursive scanning tests
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do code review focusing on duplication, complexity, and plan validation
Review suggested changes from code review with user
